# 34th Golden Bell Awards

The 34th Golden Bell Awards (Mandarin:第34屆金鐘獎) was held on March 31, 1999, at the Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hall, Taipei, Taiwan. The ceremony was broadcast live by Formosa Television.
